import React, { useState } from 'react' import './Article.scss' import { Articles } from '../../data/Articles' import {ChevronLeft as ReactElement} from '../../assets/svg/ChevronLeft' export const Article = () => { const [totalArticles, setTotalArticles] = useState(Articles.length) const [currentArticle, setCurrentArticle] = useState(0) const blog = Articles[currentArticle] return (

Read Article
